START.text:
Moonlight breaks on shattered stone. The ruin’s entrance yawns like a cracked jaw, half-swallowed by ivy and time.

You came because the road has gone quiet—and because something in the dark has started paying attention.

Your candle burns steady, as if it wants to be seen.

choices.label: Circle the entrance and scout for danger

ENTER_RUIN.text:
You cross the threshold. The air cools, and the sound of the world outside dulls.

Somewhere deeper inside, stone shifts.
ENTER_RUIN.system: The world reacts to decisive action.

choices.label: Raise your weapon and press forward

SCOUT.text:
You move slowly around the ruin’s perimeter. Scratches mar the stone—recent.

Whatever lives here knows this place well.

HALLWAY.text: The hallway stretches ahead, lined with collapsed pillars. Your footsteps echo despite your care.

END_TUTORIAL.text:
You feel it now—the sense that the world is watching, waiting to respond to your next choice.

This is only the beginning.
END_TUTORIAL.system: Tutorial complete. Your choices will shape what comes next.

DEATH.text:
Your strength fails you, and the darkness closes in.

This world does not forgive careless steps.
DEATH.system: When HP reaches zero, the run ends.
